ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Conneg for language selection: Just Say No (was: Query parameters)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Never, ever use flags when you mean languages.  Flags symbolize countries, not languages.  The relationship between languages and countries is far from
